TopicTitle: Navball Orientation Bug with Rover Variant of Mk2 Lander Can

Articles.Content:
This is more of a bug report but I don't know where the bug tracker is these days.

The brick-like rover variant of the Mk2 Lander Can  retains the VAB navball and WASD orientation even though you build rovers in the SPH.  This is because the can spawns nose-down in the SPH (like other rocket pods and probe cores) instead of horizontally like a cockpit.  When you rotate the can level, build a craft with it, and go to the runway, the navball and WASD controls are 90^ off the orientation of the vehicle.  The navball is all blue, looking at the north pole, and the yaw and roll keys are reversed and on affect the wrong axis.
@Geschosskopf There's a button in the right-click menu that will let you pick the control axis.

2 hours ago, FleshJeb said:

@Geschosskopf There's a button in the right-click menu that will let you pick the control axis.

Wow!  When did that wonderful feature come along?  Geez, I missed so much while I was gone :).

Thanks for the info!  That solved my problem!
